title: Integration tests for engine context generation
description:
End-to-end tests for context generation in the engine.

## Test Scenarios
- [ ] Epic with 3 tasks: context generated before first task
- [ ] Epic with 1 task: context generation skipped
- [ ] Context already exists: generation skipped
- [ ] Generation fails: run proceeds without context
- [ ] Context injected into prompt correctly

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Tests use mock agent (no real API calls)
- [ ] Tests create temp .ticker directory
- [ ] Verify context file created at correct path
- [ ] Verify prompt contains context section
- [ ] Verify prompt omits context section when empty

## Technical Notes
- May need to refactor Engine for better testability
- Consider adding context generation event to callbacks
